'''Camercon''' is the manager of Astro Corner Coffee Shop who caught Vic and Ripley making out in the car.

==History==
===Catching Vic and Ripley===
Cameron was out in the parking lot outside the coffee shop he manages when he saw Vic and Ripley making out in a car and getting ready to have sex. He awkwardly knocked on the window and asked them to stop. ''("[[Crash and Burn]]")''

===Vic and Ripley's Courtship===
Cameron continued to wait on Vic and Ripley as they continued to come in to Astro. He believed they were married because of the way they interacted with each other. ''("[[Always Ready]]")''

===Learning the Truth===
After Ripley died, Vic continued to go to Astro. She told Cameron that her "hubby" was working, which is why she was there alone.

After Ripley's funeral, Vic went to the coffee shop again, where she finally told Cameron the truth about Ripley not being her husband and being dead. Cameron sat in the booth with her and said it sucked. ''("[[For Whom the Bell Tolls]]")''

==Career==
He is the manager of Astro Corner Coffee Shop.

==Notes and Trivia==
*For his first appearance, Cameron was credited as Pimply Manager.
